subject: Re: Case 2024-7781 - CORRECTION
body:
Hello,

There has been a change to the Jane Smith examination (Case 2024-7781).

The exam is now scheduled for April 5, 2025 at 2:00 PM (NOT April 2nd at 9:00 AM as previously stated).

Location has also changed to our San Diego office instead of Los Angeles.

Report due date remains April 16, 2025.

Please confirm receipt of this update.

Thank you,
Scheduling Team
